Review.Titre: We never received the package and per…
Review.Contenu: We never received the package and per your website we sent two emails to Customer service asking for contact. Your website states someone will reach out within two days. You never reached out to us and your phone number that's published does not work. So no, you will not get a good review, nor would I recommend you to anyone else.
I ordered 2 heaters, and both were shattered beyond repair when I opened the package.
The item arrived not working. I want to get a refund. They're not answering of how to return Do not buy anything this vendor is offering

Absolutely the worst vendor that I have ever dealt with. I never received my order. Message stated that I would receive my order between July 18 -22. I never got it. The tracking number that they gave me didn't work. Website says "shipped", but track number only says "tracking number assigned".I'm trying to get a refund now I strongly recommend staying away from this vendor.

Never received my order, after I reached out, was told a replacement would be sent, after a week of no update, reached out again and was then told product was out of stock. They did refund me but will never purchase from this company again.

The item was impossible to put together. It was a set of 2 pool chairs and a table  The holes did not line up so you could screw the pieces of the chairs together. The table was made in a way there was zero way to put the top on. The table had no directions on how to out it together and when I contacted customer service they told me to look it up on YouTube. Not super helpful. I will never purchase from this company again. Poorly made merchandise

Review.Titre: Flaws in the finish no response from company
Review.Contenu: I sent two emails with pictures about the item I received. It had been returned previously. There are big flaws in the finish on every piece.This was weeks ago. I have never received a response to return item.Please send an undamaged item and return the damaged one.

Also Fantastic Customer Service/Support in My Opinion So Far.!!

amazon sellers have versions of the ratcheting screwdriver i bought for triple the price with less bits. saw an ad at the top of youtube with the exact thing i was already looking into so i decided to check it out thinking it would be some sketch website, turned out to be a legitimate quick and easy to use website. solid job

Very impressive with the quality of the product, I was a bit lire about buying the loungers especially because of the low price and the fact they also came with a table, Poolside they look great! A perfect house gift for my daughter!

I was there for AUKEY cup car phone holder as aukey official site couldn't add to cart anymore for some reason and not only I found AUKEY brand products at a good discounted price, but also many kitchen items that I like for so cheap! Just got the package yesterday and all the items have nice packaging and shipping is fast.

So far the power washer I purchased is working great but I will have to  reserve judgment until I use it a second time as it is replacing a power washer I paid twice as much for which worked once and then leaked all over the place so time will tell.

Review.Titre: No instructions / charger works but can’t remove.
Review.Contenu: There were no instructions so I just plugged it into the cig lighter. Is it OK to just leave it plugged in to the cig lighter all the time? (If not, I’ve got a real problem, cuz I can’t get it to come out since I put it in; it works but it’s in there so tight I can’t move it). Please help, I don’t want to damage anything by not using it correctly. Thanks!
